mapper.select: select s.tol,s.pname,m.mname from ( select sum(count) as tol,f.pname as pname,f.mid from orderList o join fproduct f on o.pid=f.pid group by o.pid ) s join merchant m on m.mid=s.mid
select sum(count) as tol,f.pname as name from orderList o join fproduct f on o.pid=f.pid group by o.pid

select of.createDate as createDate , of.stage as stage , of.name as oname , oc.count as pnumber ,oc.oid as oid from orderform of join (select oid,count from orderlist where pid = #{pid}) oc on oc.oid=of.id
select sum(totalprice) as totalprice from orderlist where oid =#{oid}
select count(*) from orderList where oid=#{oid}
mapper.insert: insert into orderList (id, pname, price, createDate, count, oid, totalprice, mname, paddress, pid ) values( #{id}, #{pname}, #{price}, #{createDate}, #{count}, #{oid}, #{totalprice}, #{mname}, #{paddress}, #{pid} )
